amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 204 (Roll no. 331).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A060) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 204 (Roll no. 331).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Ellison.
